eshmun.gui.kripke.utils

Class LogicTextPane.LogicDocumentListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.gui.kripke.utils.LogicTextPane.LogicDocumentListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener
    Enclosing class:
    LogicTextPane

    public static class LogicTextPane.LogicDocumentListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener
    Listener for document changes of a LogicTextPane (insertion, deletion, style-change), it also listens for caret movement.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean caretChanged
      Flags whether the caret has been changed recently.
      private boolean ignore
      Flags whether to ignore the next change or not.
      private long lastChanged
      Last time the textPane got changed, in milliseconds.
      private LogicTextPane textPane
      The textPane this listener belongs to

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      LogicDocumentListener(LogicTextPane textPane)
      Create a new LogicDocumentListener for the given textPane.

      • changeWithoutFiring

        public void changeWithoutFiring(java.lang.String newText,
                                javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet attr)
                         throws javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
        Change the value of the textPane without executing the handler's code.
        Parameters:
        newText - the new value of the textPane.
        attr - the display attribute (text formatting).
        Throws:
        javax.swing.text.BadLocationException - if the location to put the string in is out of range.
